summary: DOING RESEARCH ON THIS TYPE OF VEHICLE I FOUND AN ENORMOUS NUMBER OF OTHER PEOPLE WITH THIS TYPE OF VEHICLE TRANSMISSION FAILURES. AND THE CAR MANUFACTURER NEEDS TO RECALL THESE VEHICLES AND REPAIR AT NO COST TO THE OWNERS OF THIS PROBLEM. ****DIMS 11 IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****761121. *AK   *JB
